commandDescription: Execute an entire project code analisys and generate a complex and navigable report in HTML like SonarQube or Similars
outputDirFlagDescription: Path to save the generated output files. By default save result on <actualDir>/ScanResult
categoriesFlagDescription: Comma Separated Categories to analize. By default analize all categories. Available categories: %s.
pdmRuleSetFlagDescription: PMD Custom Rule Set File. By default use the default Rule Set file of Salesforce Code Analizer
eslintRuleSetFlagDescription: eslint Custom Rule Set File. By default use the default Rule Set file of Salesforce Code Analizer
qualityGateFlagDescription: Quality Gate to finish the scan with error. By default use the Low Aura Helper Quality Gate. Available Quality Gates: %s. Also can create or modify your custom quality gates for any project. Only one custom qualitu gate by project.
openFlagDescription: Open Automatically the generated report when finish the scan in the default browser.
startReportMessage: Start analizing results to create report
reportSuccessMessage: Report created successfully on %s. Open the %sindex.html file to see the report
openReportCommandMessage:
To run the generated report to see the results, run the command the next command
	sf ah scan report open --input-dir "%s"
openningReportMessage: Opening report.... Press Ctrl+C to close the server
